roleset.name: get back
roleset.note: RECOUP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'recoup' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, comparison with 'regain'. (from recoup.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: all args
example.text: An individual familiar with the negotiations said that whatever investments the limited partners do not recoup *trace* from the $ 330 million in partnership assets, they will receive from the $350 million restitution fund available as a result of Drexel's settlement with the government in December 1988.
example.arg: from the $330 million in partnership assets

example.name: usually without source
example.text: Headed toward a record drop at midday, the London stock market recouped two-thirds of its losses in the wake of New York's early rally.
example.arg: Headed toward a record drop at midday
in the wake of New York's early rally
